title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Prerequisites: NoneCourse ContentsIntroduction to Banking: Traditional and Modern Theories of Banking, Organizational Structure of Bank, Wholesale and Retail Banking, Universal Banking, Stylized Facts on Banking Performance of Banks in India; International Banking: Theory of International Banking, Trade in International Banking Services, International Payment System, Costs and Benefits of International Banking, Performance of Major International Banks; Banking Structure: British, US, Japanese, Indian, Islamic and Socialist; Competitive Issues in Banking: Measuring Bank Output, Scale and Scope Economies, Empirical Models of Competitions in Banking; Management of Risks in Banking: Credit Risk, Interest Rate Risk, Asset-Liability Management, Gap Analysis, Duration Analysis, Duration Gap Analysis, Liquidity Risk, Market Risk; Regulation and Strategic Issues of Banks in India.
